result.title: When should we use ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0)?
result.content: In problem 220B - Маленький Слоник и массив my submission 36377029 got WA. Then I comment ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0) and submit the same code 36377330 again. It got accepted. Now I wonder why my first code got WA and when we should use ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0) and when we shouldn't.
